trans-unit.source: Tiles the specified child windows of the specified parent window

seg-source.mrk: Tiles the specified child windows of the specified parent window

target.mrk: Tiles the specified child windows of the specified parent window

trans-unit.source: The array of handles to the child windows to arrange. If a specified child window is a top-level window

seg-source.mrk: The array of handles to the child windows to arrange.
If a specified child window is a top-level window

target.mrk: The array of handles to the child windows to arrange.
If a specified child window is a top-level window

trans-unit.source: with the style $WS_EX_TOPMOST or $WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW, the child window is not arranged. If this parameter

seg-source.mrk: with the style $WS_EX_TOPMOST or $WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW, the child window is not arranged.

target.mrk: with the style $WS_EX_TOPMOST or $WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW, the child window is not arranged.

trans-unit.source: is 0, all child windows of the specified parent window (or of the desktop window) are arranged.

seg-source.mrk: is 0, all child windows of the specified parent window (or of the desktop window) are arranged.

target.mrk: is 0, all child windows of the specified parent window (or of the desktop window) are arranged.

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagRECT structure that specifies the rectangular area, in client coordinates, within which the windows

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that specifies the rectangular area, in client coordinates, within which the windows

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that specifies the rectangular area, in client coordinates, within which the windows

trans-unit.source: are arranged. If this parameter is 0 (Default), the client area of the parent window is used.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the client area of the parent window is used.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the client area of the parent window is used.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Handle to the parent window. If this parameter is 0 (Default), the desktop window is assumed.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the desktop window is assumed.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), the desktop window is assumed.

trans-unit.source: [optional] A cascade flag. This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

target.mrk: This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to start arranging at.

seg-source.mrk: The index of array to start arranging at.

target.mrk: The index of array to start arranging at.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to stop arranging at.

seg-source.mrk: The index of array to stop arranging at.

target.mrk: The index of array to stop arranging at.

trans-unit.source: The value is the number of windows arranged.

seg-source.mrk: The value is the number of windows arranged.

target.mrk: The value is the number of windows arranged.
